Body:
noise_map = 2.0 * np.ones((2, 2))
noise_scaling_maps = [np.array([[1.0, 2.0], [3.0, 4.0]]), np.array([[1.0, 
    2.0], [3.0, 4.0]])]
hyper_noises = [ci_hyper.CIHyperNoiseScalar(scale_factor=1.0), ci_hyper.
    CIHyperNoiseScalar(scale_factor=2.0)]
noise_map = ci_fit.hyper_noise_map_from_noise_map_and_noise_scalings(noise_map
    =noise_map, noise_scaling_maps=noise_scaling_maps, hyper_noise_scalars=
    hyper_noises)
assert (noise_map == np.array([[5.0, 8.0], [11.0, 14.0]])).all()
